amendment.description: An amendment numbered 122 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit the EPA from using funds to arm agents as part of the agency's criminal enforcement division.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A072) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A072) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A072) Agreed to by voice vote.
